slides.title: Step 1
slides.text: Apply the "Forward" Laplace transform to the differential equation, converting it into an algebraic "Laplace" Equation.

slides.title: Step 2
slides.text:
Solve the Laplace Equation for Y(s).
This is the "Laplace Solution".

slides.title: Step 3
slides.text: Prepare Y(s) for a "Backward" transform by writing it as a sum of terms that match entries in the transform table.

slides.title: Step 4
slides.text: Apply the "Backward" inverse Laplace transform to Y(s).
